title: What if I lose my keys or password?
content: We can not recover your information for you. If you lose your information,  it's
content_1: . ByteballWallet doesn't store any data. After you've  received your keys and set up a password, we strongly suggest you:
tip_1: Write Your Keys And Password Down. Keep Them Safe.
tip_2: Don't Store Your Keys And Password on Your Computer or Phone.
